Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Looks to be a dupe... Nick is working the update.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~markparz a dupe of which JIRA? There are like 1,000 open;-) Please be specific and if it is indeed a duplicate, please update this accordingly to flag it as a duplicate, identify the duplicate issue and close this.

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: I was hung over or something... I saw the release note one and thought is was a dupe... ignore

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: submitted patch in ci-management repository to publish fabric binaries to nexus repository.. https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/8939/ Need +2's on this.. Once this patch is merged will trigger fabric-binaries job from production CI and share the link to ~nickgaski .

Action.author: nickgaski
Action.body: hey I think we need some solid confirmation that the manual commands truly work on linux (it definitely does on mac). We know the script does on linux... ~rameshthoomu ~Ratnakar - would you guys mind running through the manual steps tomorrow - Friday 5/19.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~nickgaski @odowdaibm this last comment about whether the manual steps work is EXACTLY why I want to have an annotated script (network_setup.sh is fine) that we just TALK ABOUT in the prose, rather than telling people what the manual steps/commands are. No one is ever going to run the process manually.
